name: Achatina
description: Generates cementing paste and organic polymer.

name: Allosaurus
description: High DPS bleed and pack bonus.

name: Ankylosaurus
description: Superior metal, crystal, oil, flint, and obsidian gathering.

name: Anglerfish
description: Collects angler gel and silica pearls.

name: Araneomorphus
description: Slows enemies with web attack.

name: Archaeopteryx
description: Passively gathers tree sap and acts as a parachute.

name: Argentavis
description: High weight flyer with a smithy saddle.

name: Arthropluera
description: Acid spit destroys armor and structures.

name: Baryonyx
description: Decent underwater fighter, stun attack, no oxygen stat.

name: Basilosaurus
description: Generates oil, immune to shock damage.

name: Beelzebufo
description: Gathers cementing paste from bugs, great travel mount.

name: Brontosaurus
description: Gathers berries and has a high weight.

name: Carbonemys
description: High damage reduction shell.

name: Carnotaurus
description: Average carnivore.

name: Castoroides
description: Extremely high wood gathering, saddle acts as a smithy.

name: Chalicotherium
description: Acts as a catapult, gathers berries.

name: Coelacanth
description: No special abilities.

name: Compy
description: Shoulder mount with pack bonus.

name: Daeodon
description: Powerful healer, gathers cactus sap and rare mushrooms.

name: Dilophosaur
description: Spit blinds enemies.

name: Dimetrodon
description: Acts as an air conditioner.

name: Dimorphodon
description: Good at swarming enemies.

name: Diplocaulus
description: Acts as an oxygen tank, kills trilobites instantly.

name: Diplodocus
description: Can carry up to 11 players, has knockback.

name: Direbear
description: Gathers fiber and honey, fast and strong.

name: Direwolf
description: Gathers pelt, leech blood, and angler gel.

name: Dodo
description: Livestock for eggs or prime meat.

name: Doedicurus
description: Gathers stone and sand efficiently.

name: Dung Beetle
description: Converts poop into fertilizer and oil.

name: Dunkleosteus
description: Gathers oil, crystal, stone, and metal.

name: Electrophorus
description: Shocks enemies, slowing them down.

name: Equus
description: Saddle acts as mortar and pestle, has a back kick.

name: Gallimimus
description: Fastest land mount, carries three people.

name: Giant Bee
description: Generates honey, consumes rare flowers.

name: Giganotosaurus
description: Apex carnivore, gathers prime meat.

name: Gigantopithecus
description: Passively gathers fiber, can throw riders.

name: Hesperornis
description: Gathers organic polymer and lays golden eggs.

name: Hyaenodon
description: Saddlebags act as a fridge, gain pack bonus.

name: Ichthyosaurus
description: Fast and efficient for black pearls.

name: Ichthyornis
description: Hunts and retrieves prime meat.

name: Iguanodon
description: Best at gathering biotoxin, stamina-efficient.

name: Kairuku
description: Provides hypothermic insulation, drops organic polymer.

name: Kaprosuchus
description: Can carry small to medium creatures, has a leap attack.

name: Kentrosaurus
description: Armor-piercing attacks, pack bonus.

name: Leech
description: No special abilities.

name: Liopleurodon
description: Boosts loot rarity, temporary tame.

name: Lystrosaurus
description: Provides exp boost when pet.

name: Mammoth
description: High weight reduction for wood, fast attack rate.

name: Manta
description: Fastest water mount with jumping ability.

name: Megalania
description: Climbs walls and infects players with rabies.

name: Megaloceros
description: Males gather thatch, females are fast.

name: Megalodon
description: Decent water carnivore.

name: Megalosaurus
description: Powerful night hunter, no sleep deprivation on Aberration.

name: Megatherium
description: Bug killer, gathers chitin, cactus sap, thatch, fiber, and berries.

name: Mesopithecus
description: Warns about nearby enemies, throws poop.

name: Microraptor
description: Knocks enemy players off mounts.

name: Mosasaurus
description: Apex water carnivore with high weight.

name: Moschops
description: Passive resource harvesting.

name: Onyc
description: Destroys armor quickly.

name: Otter
description: Gathers silica and black pearls, provides insulation.

name: Oviraptor
description: Increases egg laying of Dinos, can steal wild or enemy eggs.

name: Ovis
description: Harvest wool, climb cliffs, great food for taming carnivores.

name: Pachy
description: Attacks do torpor, charge attack damages structures.

name: Pachyrhinosaurus
description: Uses pheromones to affect Dino behavior.

name: Paraceratherium
description: Platform saddle with decent speed.

name: Parasaur
description: Fear ability and can act as a tripwire.

name: Pegomastax
description: Steals items from players, acts as a backpack.

name: Pelagornis
description: Gathers organic polymer, can fish while riding.

name: Phiomia
description: Produces a lot of poop when fed stimberries.

name: Piranha
description: No special abilities.

name: Plesiosaur
description: Platform saddle, high weight, super fast.

name: Procoptodon
description: Can carry an extra player and babies in pouch.

name: Pteranodon
description: Extremely fast flying mount.

name: Pulmonoscorpius
description: Capable knockout Dino.

name: Purlovia
description: Acts as a land mine and hidden vault.

name: Quetzal
description: Platform saddle, high health and weight.

name: Raptor
description: Pack bonus and vocalizations provide buffs.

name: Rex
description: Best tank and DPS for bosses, has a roar ability.

name: Tek Rex
description: Slightly more powerful than Rex.

name: Sabertooth
description: Gathers chitin, keratin, and hide efficiently.

name: Salmon
description: Can be killed for prime fish.

name: Sarco
description: Quick water movement, amphibious, no stamina drain.

name: Spinosaur
description: Good swimmer with water-based boosts.

name: Stegosaurus
description: Armored plates drain turret ammo.

name: Tapejara
description: Can carry three players and attach to walls.

name: Terror Bird
description: Can glide down, fairly fast mount.

name: Therizinosaur
description: Gathers resources efficiently, high DPS.

name: Thylacoleo
description: Climbs vertical surfaces and immobilizes prey.

name: Titanoboa
description: Can climb high walls.

name: Titanosaur
description: Temporary tame, powerful platform saddle.

name: Triceratops
description: Rivalry buff for nearby trikes, good for berry gathering.

name: Trilobite
description: Can be killed for various resources.

name: Troodon
description: Increased aggression radius at night.

name: Tusoteuthis
description: Can carry large Dinos, generates oil and biotoxin.

name: Woolly Rhinoceros
description: Powerful charge attack and resource gathering.

name: Yutyrannus
description: Provides attack and defense buffs.
